nodes.text: We should pass the reform now
There are many doctors out of practice because of high costs
As I have traveled our country I have met too many good doctors especially ob-gyn who are being forced out of practice because of the high cost of lawsuits
And in all we do to improve health care in America we will make sure that health decisions are made by doctors and patients not by bureaucrats in Washington D.C.
The best means to make sure that health decisions are made by doctors and patients is to pass the reform
There is the need of making the health care more affordable
To make health care more affordable and accessible we must pass medical liability reform now.
